description.value:
[Service]

Prerequisites: Tier 0 with any faction

Cost: 25 Fame (@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.kqhPt9344UkcGVYO]{Resurrection Ritual}) or 50 Fame (@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.IkGYwHRLhkuoGReG]{Raise Dead Spell})

Effect: The Pathfinder Society is invested in keeping its most successful agents in the field. You can purchase a @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.kqhPt9344UkcGVYO]{Resurrection} ritual for 25 Fame. If you are in a rush to return to life and cannot wait the day for this ritual to be conducted, you can instead purchase a casting of the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.IkGYwHRLhkuoGReG]{Raise Dead} spell for 50 Fame.

Special: This reward can be purchased multiple times, as it strictly represents the ability to secure the listed services.
